summary: Users have difficulty finding information in the TypeScript SDK documentation. A search feature is needed to improve discoverability, potentially using Algolia or alternative solutions.
userImpact: Users spend more time navigating SDK documentation to find relevant information without a search feature.
proposedFix: Implement a search feature in SDK documentation, exploring solutions without Algolia dependency if possible.
resolutionDetails: Search functionality was implemented in the SDK documentation.
keyQuote: hard to find things in the SDK docs, search would be nice!
